preface.title: Preface
preface.para: The aim of this document is to provide an effective guide for developers to help them using the Logica Business Process Management Framework.

section.title: How to use this book ?
section.para: If you are novice and want be initiated to framework you can use the getting starter chapter.
If you already have some experience with BPM tools and want to improve your skills you can read the chapter upon advanced concept.
For deployment issues please refer to Installation procedure, setting up section, exploitation and administration chapters.

section.title: Font conventions
section.para: The book follows naming conventions and font usage. Understanding these conventions up-front makes it easier to read this book.

listitem.para: Used for filenames, file extensions, url, application names, important terms and finally keywords and first appearance of new terms.
Used for Java class names, methods, variables, properties, data types, database elements, and snippets of code that appear in text.
Used for commands you enter at the command line and to highlight new code inserted in a running example.
